biography: The Utopia Strong is a neo-kraut trio consisting of Kavus Torabi, Michael J. York and former snooker champion Steve Davis. They released their self-titled album in 2019. Read more on Last.fm. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License; additional terms may apply.
name: The Utopia Strong
